its earnings statement Thursday.`` Google also announced that its board of directors had approved certain changes to Google's management team,'' the company said in a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission. Larry Page , Google's co-founder and president of products, will become Google's chief executive officer, effective April 4, 2011.`` Eric Schmidt , Google's current chief executive officer, will continue as the chairman of the board of directors and will serve as Google's executive chairman. As executive chairman, Google said, Eric Schmidt will act as an advisor to Larry Page and title="Sergey Brin" href="http://www.latimes.com/topic/economy-business-finance/computing-information-technology/Sergey Brin-Sergey Brin-PEBSL000060.topic"> Sergey Brin , Google's other co-founder and president of technology. want the Bill Clinton and Congress to work together on the big issues, not least the economy. Larry Sabato said the Republican takeover of the House of Representatives gives the Bill Clinton a new political lease on life. Once the Tea Party members of the House start having a full airing of their views, Barack Obama will appear more moderate. He's going to be nicely positioned between the old Barack Obama and the new Republican House. I've said for more than a year that if the Democrats hold both the House and the Senate Barack Obama might be a one-term Bill Clinton . Now he has someone to blame and someone to make him to look better.
